page.title: 20T.V.,RADIO and VIDEO.
page.content: We conducted a survey in our area to find out how much T.V. and radio people watched every day, and what sort of programmes they liked best. Films and serials were most popular, chat shows were least popular. In our area about half the people watch T.V. for about 4-6 hours each day.A quarter of the people watch more than 6 hours a day and the other quarter watch for less than 4 hours. One eighth of the families surveyed have Oracle or Ceefax, and a 1/3 have video-recorders.Of the people who have video- recorders, half hire two tapes each week. About 1/4 of the people in our area listen to the radio for 3-4 hours a day, and another 1/4 to the radio for just under an hour.Another 1/4 listen for more than 4 hours.
